com.cloudera.cdk.data.hbase.avro
Class GenericAvroDao

java.lang.Object
  com.cloudera.cdk.data.hbase.BaseDao<GenericRecord,GenericRecord>
      com.cloudera.cdk.data.hbase.avro.GenericAvroDao
All Implemented Interfaces:
Dao<GenericRecord,GenericRecord>
public class GenericAvroDao
extends BaseDao<GenericRecord,GenericRecord>

A Dao for Avro's GenericRecords. In this Dao implementation, both the underlying key record type, and the entity type are GenericRecords. This Dao allows us to persist and fetch these GenericRecords to and from HBase.

Constructor Summary

Constructor Detail

GenericAvroDao

public GenericAvroDao(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.HTablePool tablePool,
                      String tableName,
                      String keySchemaStr,
                      String entitySchemaString)
Construct a GenericAvroDao.

Parameters:
tablePool - An HTablePool instance to use for connecting to HBase.
tableName - The name of the table this Dao will read from and write to in HBase.
keySchemaStr - The Avro schema that represents the Key structure for row keys in this table.
entitySchemaString - The json string representing the special avro record schema, that contains metadata in annotations of the Avro record fields. See AvroEntityMapper for details.

GenericAvroDao

public GenericAvroDao(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.HTablePool tablePool,
                      String tableName,
                      String keySchemaStr,
                      InputStream entitySchemaStream)
Construct a GenericAvroDao.

Parameters:
tablePool - An HTablePool instance to use for connecting to HBase.
tableName - The name of the table this Dao will read from and write to in HBase.
keySchemaStr - The Avro schema that represents the Key structure for row keys in this table.
entitySchemaStream - The InputStream that contains a json string representing the special avro record schema, that contains metadata in annotations of the Avro record fields. See AvroEntityMapper for details.

GenericAvroDao

public GenericAvroDao(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.HTablePool tablePool,
                      String tableName,
                      String entityName,
                      SchemaManager schemaManager,
                      String entitySchemaString)
Construct the GenericAvroDao with an EntityManager, which will provide the entity mapper to this Dao that knows how to map the different entity schema versions defined by the managed schema. The entitySchemaString parameter represents the schema to use for writes.

Parameters:
tablePool - An HTabePool instance to use for connecting to HBase.
tableName - The table name of the managed schema.
entityName - The entity name of the managed schema.
schemaManager - The EntityManager which will create the entity mapper that will power this dao.
entitySchemaString - The schema as a string representing the schema version that this DAO should use for writes.

GenericAvroDao

public GenericAvroDao(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.HTablePool tablePool,
                      String tableName,
                      String entityName,
                      SchemaManager schemaManager)
Construct the GenericAvroDao with an EntityManager, which will provide the entity mapper to this Dao that knows how to map the different entity schema versions defined by the managed schema. The newest schema version available at the time of this dao's creation will be used for writes.

Parameters:
tablePool - An HTabePool instance to use for connecting to HBase.
tableName - The table name of the managed schema.
entityName - The entity name of the managed schema.
schemaManager - The SchemaManager which will create the entity mapper that will power this dao.
